messages.subject: NHK Alert
messages.msgSnippet: I think I m loving this show more and more. You need to check out the synopsis of episodes for August (url below)...first up is Nagakura s bitch and moan
messages.messageBody:
I think I'm loving this show more and more. You need to check out the
synopsis of episodes for August (url below)...first up is Nagakura's
bitch and moan petition to Matsudaira...can the kinshin thing be far
behind???

http://www.nhk-jn.co.jp/wp/best_e_next.htm

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
